Interface ScriptPath

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectoryScriptPath, JarScriptPath
public interface ScriptPath

Method Summary
 boolean contains(java.lang.String name)
          Returns whether or not this ScriptPath object contains a particular script

          Returns the Script object associated with the named script relative to this ScriptPath.
 

Method Detail

contains

boolean contains(java.lang.String name)
Returns whether or not this ScriptPath object contains a particular script

Parameters:
name - The name of the script.
Returns:
true if this ScriptPath contains the named script

get

Script get(java.lang.String name)
           throws java.io.IOException
Returns the Script object associated with the named script relative to this ScriptPath.

Parameters:
name - The name of the script to get.
Returns:
the Script object
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem getting the script
